job_title: Diffusion and Implant Shift Process Technician
job_description:
• Ability to work 12-hour shifts (3 days on/4 days off and 4 days on/3 days off), progress between day and night shifts every 4 months, and adapt to different shifts and overtime as needed to support business operations.
• Prior experience in semiconductor fabrication process areas, with direct hands-on involvement in operating and maintaining process-specific equipment and supporting systems.
• Demonstrates effective time management, organizational skills, and the ability to prioritize tasks and communicate clearly across teams.
• Apply skills in Microsoft Office applications (Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, OneNote, Excel) to efficiently complete tasks.
• 2+ year’s experience working with data science and programming languages such as SQL, Python, or similar technologies.
• Escalate when updates or corrections are needed.
• Complete all required safety training and ensure adherence to safety protocols.
• Associate or Bachelor’s degree in a STEM related field.

• This role provides an opportunity to gain hands-on experience in optimizing deep learning architectures while contributing to cutting-edge ML solutions in AdTech.
• We are also open to remote applicants Optimize ML models – Improve predictive accuracy, inference speed, and efficiency in AdTech applicationsExperiment & tune – Run hyperparameter tuning, explore new architectures, and fine-tune models to move the needle on key business metricsBuild strong datasets – Help construct and preprocess high-quality training data for ML pipelinesRun experiments – Conduct PyTorch experiments and evaluate results using clear, measurable metricsDeploy at scale – Collaborate with researchers and engineers to build scalable ML pipelines for smooth deployment and iterationStay ahead of the curve – Keep up with deep learning research and propose novel approaches for model improvementCommunicate findings – Present research and experimental outcomes in clear reports that influence decision-making Educational foundation – Pursuing or recently completed a Master’s or Ph.
• In CS, Stats, EE, or a related fieldDeep learning fluent – Strong grasp of architectures like Transformers and hands-on with PyTorchExperimentation-driven – Skilled in hyperparameter tuning, loss function design, and optimizing training pipelines.
• Python-first – Proficient in Python for data manipulation and ML experimentationBroad ML knowledge – Familiar with techniques like gradient boosting (XGBoost), PCA, and distributed trainingCloud & data aware – Comfortable with AWS/GCP and have some exposure to Spark, Hadoop, or SQLStrong communicator – Can explain technical results clearly and thrive in a collaborative, fast-paced environment LLM experience – Worked with large language models or fine-tuned transformer-based architecturesAdTech exposure – Familiarity with real-time bidding (RTB) or online advertising modelsPerformance optimizer – Experience with C++ for ML model performance tuning Festiv – We make work fun with cross-team games, events, and creative team bondingResponsiv – You’ll be close to clients and leadership, influencing real outcomesInclusiv – Diversity and individuality are celebrated across all levelsInventiv – We reward curiosity and embrace bold ideasTransformativ – We support your growth with training, mentorship, and flexibilityCollaborativ – We operate across coasts, connected by purpose and teamwork.
• We are looking for a Machine Learning Research Intern to join our AdTech research team for 2025 Fall.
• This internship is ideal for students or recent graduates passionate about deep learning, model optimization, and performance tuning in real-world applications.
• You will work closely with our ML Research Scientists to enhance Deep Neural Network (DNN) models, focusing on improving key metrics in our real-time bidding (RTB) algorithms and Large Language Model (LLM) integrations.
• You will participate in research discussions, implement and evaluate model improvements, and collaborate with ML engineers to refine training pipelines.
